name: Arbour Hotel and Residence Pattaya
detail: The bathroom was gorgeous with a separate shower & bathtub.

name: Flipper Lodge
detail: I think this is a very underrated hotel given some other hotels I've stayed at. First the room (building B is newer) was clean bright and just nice to be in. No bugs, everything worked including the high speed wireless internet and the plumbing. Great shower pressure. Friendly counter service and doormen as well as efficient check in and check out. The pool was nice and they provide in room towels so you don't have to hunt for someone to get you a pool towel (this could not be said for the Asia Bangkok a higher star hotel with far worse service in every possible regard). Buffet was decent but don't expect anything amazing. They charge $159 baht and it's worth that but probably no more. But they gotta make some money too. Wireless internet is $150 baht a day or $250 baht for 3 days - very reasonable considering other hotels in Thailand - the Asia Bangkok for example charges $200 baht for 20 minutes!! The internet is an investment for the hotel. One hotel I stayed at had free internet but it also didn't work all the time. At the Flipper Lodge it did - perfectly. Great location - 1 minute to the beach and 3 minutes(maybe) to the best shopping mall in town. The room was reasonably quiet from street noise - considering where it is that is no small feat. If you are a very light sleeper it may not work - I could still hear a slight bass rumble from the parting down the block. But it really is very little noise. I am not surprised that people were already booking for 3 week stays claiming it their favorite place to stay in Pattaya. People think they can walk up and book but they could not get in - sold out. I don't know why it only has a 2 and 1/2 star rating - it's much better than that.
area: Pattaya Beach Road,Pattaya - View on map

name: Balihai Bay Residence
detail: Just spend a night before going to Ko Larn island the next day , I will rated this hotel as 4 star rather than 3 star hotel , this is a very new hotel in pattaya , the room is big and spacious, hotel staff performance is excellent, and very helpful .

name: Mera Mare Pattaya
detail: always stays this hotel in Pattaya. quiet area, clean, reasonable price and no Chinese tour groups. I hope stays like this.
area: Pattaya Beach Road,Pattaya - View on map

name: Pattaya Sea View Hotel
detail: This is the best hotel in pattaya the staff @front desk is the best good English and very polite they treat you like a quest every time I come in and out they greet you The breakfast is out of this world value for money .My room was on the six floor with balcony and seawiev spectacular view of sea and I love that you can see the big sign That say pattaya city The cleaning staff is excellent clean my room everyday the room was very clean with a nice shower an bathtub I can't wait to come back see you in December 2019 for 3 weeks Keep up the good work and again thank you for a exelemt holiday pattaya sea view is the best
area: Pattaya Beach Road,Pattaya - View on map

name: Hotel Amber Pattaya
detail: For a 4 star hotel you are not going to get anything better!!! A brand new hotel that is immaculate, gym, sauna, nice pool area and a great room. We had a Superior room with a queen bed that was so comfortable. Buffet breakfast was nice with plenty of options English, Thai and Indian. Location is perfect, on a quieter street set back a little but walk 2 mins up the street and you are right in mix for bars and everything Pattaya offers. Price point was fantastic value for money. You can not go wrong staying athe Hotel Amber.

name: P Plus Hotel
detail: Motel has one of the best gyms in Pattaya.

name: March Hotel
detail: March hotel is a brand new property which provides you with best in class amenities within affordable price. I booked this hotel from Agoda with expectations of getting a class facility similar to April and August suites as the owner is same - and the hotel exceeded my expectations - I have previously stayed in April suites also so I trusted this new property - really they kept my trust. This hotel is managed, staffed and maintained to the highest degree and is excellent value for money. It is Located near to Tops supermarket( Central Pattaya) in a quiet street (very common in Thailand provincial towns), but the nightlife is only 3-4 minutes away. This may not be a 5 start luxury hotel but the interior design, decoration and layout makes it a very comfortable stay. The balcony is big, the fridge is big, the pool is well designed - in short it is much better than many of the 4 star establishments in Pattaya and elsewhere. I stayed with my 4 friends and one couple - all of them may not be free to write a review but on their behalf too it was rated the best value for money hotel. The receptionist Miss Julia took great care for all of us - she is very polite and caring. We started our stay very next day of the Grand opening of the hotel and I am sure the standards will be maintained in the coming years too. To close this review at last I would like to add - I really enjoyed my stay here, believe me and you will also.

name: Natural Beach Hotel
detail: This hotel is in a prime location, right on Beach Rd only moments away from everything. The bathrooms are a little outdated but other than that it's a great hotel and i would gladly stay there again. Also the massage services downstairs give some of the best massages in Pattaya.
area: Pattaya Beach Road,Pattaya - View on map

name: Siam @ Siam Design Hotel Pattaya
detail: brand new hotel in pattaya! i've always thought the what ever photos they post in agoda doesnt really look like what the actual hotel is. but i was wrong, beside the hotel is cheap the room is very nice, clean and huge. i got the leisure room and it was one of the best room's i had. the infinity pool was amazing! just like the marina bay sand's in singapore, the hotels pool was outstanding. two pools, 24th and 26th floor. they also show movies every night 1900 at the pool. the staff were very helpful and attentive, from the moment you check-in to the moment you check-out. i really loved the hotel, i would stay again in this hotel if i come back to pattaya.
